transcription: Well, I am a finance major actually and I figured what better way to start in banking than to be a teller and see where that can take me. I think a lot of people are hesitant towards it because they think it might be boring or too much to deal with numbers.  I kind of thought that when I first came in, but really, yeah, you have to be able to deal with the numbers as well. But it's not really boring. I get to meet new people all the time, and I'm handling different transactions every day. This is a friendly environment. Being a customer service rep, that is my job, is to help customers. I enjoy the people I work with, and I get to work with customers on a daily basis. I think that's probably my favorite part, is just those regular customers.  that I get to see. Every time I see him, a smile immediately comes to my face.
